title: An Idea for Teleport
body:
Kind of like toward the end of Season 5, {{summoner:12}}  is being used by practically every mid/top laner for the safety/play-making potential it brings.

What if you raised the cooldown to 400 seconds but added this: "If you get a kill/assist within 10 seconds of casting, cooldown is reduced to 200 seconds." The CD reduction to 200 for cancelling would still be there.

That way it'd discourage using {{summoner:12}}  just to get back to lane and make laning counters more meaningful, while still rewarding using it to help your team.

replies.body: What's wrong with using it to get back to lane? Using it to secure kills or defend bot lane is the reason why it is op

Yea that's a bad idea, the good uses for it is getting back to lane or to a map position, the reason why it's op is the flank plays it makes making it a must have.

You're practically buffing it's flanking thus making it even more of a must use summoner and an overall horrible idea.
